mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_shopping_goods ORDER BY goods_credate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT goods_title FROM t_shopping_goods WHERE goods_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY goods_credate DESC
SELECT d.goods_isbn, d.filename AS fileName FROM t_goods_detail_image d WHERE d.filetype != 'main_image' AND d.goods_isbn = #{goods_isbn}

SELECT g.*, d.filename AS fileName FROM t_shopping_goods g JOIN t_goods_detail_image d ON g.goods_isbn = d.goods_isbn WHERE d.filetype = 'main_image' AND g.goods_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') ORDER BY g.goods_credate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_shopping_goods ( goods_id, goods_sort, goods_title, goods_writer, goods_published_date, goods_total_page, goods_isbn, goods_delivery_price, goods_delivery_date, goods_price, goods_sales_price, goods_fileName ) VALUES ( #{goods_isbn}, #{goods_sort}, #{goods_title}, #{goods_writer}, #{goods_published_date}, #{goods_total_page}, #{goods_isbn}, #{goods_delivery_price}, #{goods_delivery_date}, #{goods_price}, #{goods_sales_price}, #{goods_fileName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_shopping_goods SET goods_title = #{goods_title}, goods_writer = #{goods_writer}, goods_published_date = #{goods_published_date}, goods_total_page = #{goods_total_page}, goods_delivery_price = #{goods_delivery_price}, goods_delivery_date = #{goods_delivery_date}, goods_price = #{goods_price}, goods_sales_price = #{goods_sales_price}, goods_fileName = #{goods_fileName}, goods_sort = #{goods_sort}, goods_publisher = #{goods_publisher} WHERE goods_isbn = #{goods_isbn}
